ernest
Class BinarySensorymotorSystem

java.lang.Object
  ernest.BinarySensorymotorSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISensorymotorSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Visual100SensorymotorSystem
public class BinarySensorymotorSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISensorymotorSystem

The binary sensorymotor system can only sense a binary feedback from the environment. This sensorymotor system is provided as an example for the SimpleMaze environment, and as a parent class for more complex sensorymotor systems.

Author:
ogeorgeon

enactedAct

public IAct enactedAct(IAct act,

Determine the enacted act This implementation does not assume that the resulting act already exists If the resulting act did not exist then it is created with a satisfaction value of 0.
